subject: Boxing
lead_paragraph: A trainer for the heavyweight champion Wladimir Klitschko said that the boxer fought most of his title bout against Lamon Brewster with a broken left hand.The trainer, Jamen Ali Bashir, told The Associated Press yesterday that Klitschko broke his middle finger during the fight. Klitschko iced his hand immediately afterward, and is now wearing a cast from his left hand past his elbow. “It will take eight weeks to heal,” Bashir said.Despite the injury, Klitschko dominated the fight Saturday night. Brewster’s trainer, Buddy McGirt, stopped the fight before the seventh round, and Klitschko kept his International Boxing Federation and International Boxing Organization titles.
